Description: PLEASE READ WHOLE DESCRIPTION VERY RARE piece, Zentra calibre 850, 17 jewels, manual winding watch, normal/descent condition. Vintage watch from 60's, fully working condition. It has never been polished or buffed. Dial has some signs of age and patina.Acrylic glass is clear without visible scratches. Case is 20 microns GP, in excellent condition for it's age. Stainless steel back.Genuine leather strap, lug width 18 mm. Keeping time in good manner. Please bear in mind that this is old watch and should be serviced from time to time. I will take it to watchmaker to do regular check on your demand upon purchase. Reason for this is that watch is working nicely and does not show any need for servicing but I will do this on your demand, free of charge. Excellent German technology, classic, formal dress men's watch, you can see dimensions on pictures. Excellent timepiece, collectible movement. I can send more pictures on your demand. Movement data took from web: ZentRa 850 (Bifora 113) Featuresmanual windsweep second Data11.5''', Dm= 25.55mm, Do= 25.95mmH= 5.0mmF= 0.9mmT= 1.9mm17/21 jewelsf = 18000 A/hpower reserve 42h Bidding/Buying: I do this as hobby, because I like timepieces, so money is not the prime interest. Price posted here is according to my estimation and knowledge. Feel free to send best offers. Please consider that EMS shipping is flat rate 20 $, so when sending best offer note if you want EMS or Economy shipping, my recommendation is always EMS option. Please bear in mind that I collect watches, hunt for good pieces, examine, take to professional watchmaker for service etc. So some time and effort is invested in every watch I sell. I'm trying to be as honest as possible about every detail, no hidden stuff is possible as far as I'm concerned. Please feel free to ask questions.Look for pictures carefully, I always post original pictures of selling item, there are no pictures taken from other places.If something is faulty or missing, I will highlight that for sure. Every watch is sold "AS IS" and as described. Returns are normally accepted if item is not as described.Buyer pays return shipping cost.Covered by Ebay Money Back guarantee. Shipping & handling: Every watch ill be carefully packed and protected. I will ship using EMS International Post service with tracking option by default, cost is flat rate 19,5 $ already calculated in total cost . Economy shipping is available only for EMEA countries, overseas must use EMS for better trackability and insurance.FedEx is an optional way, preferred for more expensive items or as fastest way of shipping.If you prefer some other way of shipping please contact me first. Response is usually next business day, so I will ship an item same or next day after receiving cleared payment.
ConditionDescription: Pre-owned, working,descent condition. Genuine leather strap. Case 9/10, dial 18/10, crystal 9/10. Not polished or buffed to keep authenticity. Keeping good time. Very rare and collectible wristwatch! ASK for more pictures!
Title: ZENTRA cal 850 two tone dial, VTG hand winding watch from 60's
